name: Nebula - Dark Mode (customizable theme)
description:
A comprehensive dark mode for watchnebula.com. You can customize side-wide colors by changing the variables in :root, so you can take this dark theme and easily make it any theme you want!

I tried my best to work out most of the kinks!
additional_info:
Written by Parker Addison.
